summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%) and rainfall (up 0.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 322 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 493 m), and rainfall (down 0.5 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 322.2m lower than yesterday, 492.8m lower than past week, 444.0m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 292m to a maximum of 1476m, averaging 440.8m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 933.5m and 884.8m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, a strong muggy feeling will dominate and mostly calm with light air movement. Possible light showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
